import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Card, { CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../components/ui/Card'; import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from '../components/ui/Select'; import { LineChart, Line, BarChart, Bar, PieChart, Pie, ScatterChart, Scatter, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, Cell } from 'recharts'; const DashboardApp = () => { // Sample data - this is crucial for the charts to work const data = [ { year: 2020, intensity: 75, likelihood: 80, relevance: 85, country: "United States", city: "New York", topic: "AI", sector: "Technology", region: "North America" }, { year: 2021, intensity: 65, likelihood: 70, relevance: 75, country: "United Kingdom", city: "London", topic: "Healthcare", sector: "Medical", region: "Europe" }, { year: 2022, intensity: 85, likelihood: 90, relevance: 95, country: "China", city: "Beijing", topic: "Climate", sector: "Environment", region: "Asia" } ]; const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ endYear: 'all', topic: 'all', sector: 'all', region: 'all', country: 'all', city: 'all' }); const handleFilterChange = (filterName, value) => { setFilters(prev => ({ ...prev, [filterName]: value })); }; return (

{data.map((entry, index) => ( ))}

); }; export default DashboardApp;
